products.name: Olive Textured Relaxed-Fit Cotton Jacket

The olive green shade keeps it classic and easy to style, making it a must-have piece for casual outings, travel days, or an elevated streetwear look.

Designed to make a statement, this jacket features a plush, ultra-soft faux fur texture that feels luxurious and looks effortlessly stylish. The soothing lavender shade adds a dreamy, feminine touch, perfect for elevating any winter outfit.
